remarks: The adjoint function is a function.  This is not immediately apparent from ~ df-aj but results from the uniqueness shown by ~ ajmoi . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ajfun.5 $e |- A = ( U adj W ) $.
ajfun $p |- ( ( U e. CPreHilOLD /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> Fun A ) $.
